constraints.name: distinct_values
constraints.description: 所有节点和边的值必须是唯一的，且在 [1, 2n-1] 范围内
constraints.formal: ∀ i, j ∈ {nodes ∪ edges}, value(i) ≠ value(j) ∧ 1 ≤ value(i) ≤ 2n-1

constraints.name: minimize_max_cost
constraints.description: 选择一个根节点，使得从该根节点出发到任何节点或边的简单路径的最大成本最小化
constraints.formal: minimize(max(cost(root, v)) for all v in nodes ∪ edges)

constraints.name: cost_definition
constraints.description: 路径的成本定义为路径上所有节点和边的值的异或和
constraints.formal: cost(u, v) = XOR(value(x) for all x in path(u, v))
